name: overdose pill
description: Designed for individuals that thrive off of addictions and feral highs. It almost certainly will cause the consumer to overdose. Before their passing however, they'll feel like a million bucks, guaranteed.

use_action.activation_message: You pop an overdose pill. Not bad, that was wild.

name: radiant pill
description: This nondescript pill is capable of giving the eater obscene amounts of radiation. Unless you can use that to your advantage, it'd be best to steer clear from this...

use_action.activation_message: You pop a radiant pill. Not bad, that was wild.

name: full-course meal pill
description: The iridescent and color exterior exites appetite within you. By consuming this pill, it would be equivalent to having a full-course meal, with complimentary drinks!

use_action.activation_message: You pop a full-course meal pill. Not bad, that was wild.

name: fake full-course meal pill
description: Adored by celebrities, this pill will make you feel like you have a full stomach without actually eating. Hey, placebo is a powerful thing, alright? Sometimes you want to feel full without being full.

use_action.activation_message: You pop a fake full-course meal pill. Not bad, that was wild.

name: invisible pill
description: This minute pill can only be observed through intense concentration and much squinting. After swallowing it, the eater will become effectively invisible for a full minute.

use_action.activation_message: You pop an invisible pill. Not bad, that was wild.

name: miracle healing pill
description: The single most revolutionary item in the alternate history of medicine, this healing pill doesn't just heal you once, nay, it is a miracle healing pill that can be used effectively forever!

name: instant restoration pill
description: Intended for emegencies when you can't wait around for your flesh to heal on its own. Use when you need to regenrate now, ASAP!

name: boom pill
description: This boom pill isn't even a pill at all, except that its vaguely shaped like one. Its rough, coarse, and uneven surface hides away a fully functional explosive hidden behind its outer shell. It cannot be swallowed, most unfortunately.

name: tickled boom pill
description: This boom pill isn't even a pill at all, except that its vaguely shaped like one. Its rough, coarse, and uneven surface hides away a fully functional explosive hidden behind its outer shell. It cannot be swallowed, most unfortunately. It has been tickled.

use_action.no_deactivate_msg: You've already tickled the %s's funny bone; try throwing it instead.

name: greed pill
description: The greed pill was used by Wonka Industries, Inc. in their most desperate times during the brutal Oompa Loompa Revolution of '98 and has since gone out of vogue amongst the corporate echelon. However, outside investors seem more than willing to obtain a piece of this technology, as it allows the holder of said pill to create an endless quantity of it. This pill was single-handedly responsible for the economic downfall of entire nations and of the market order itself. Head to the Recipes tab to double this pill.

use_action.activation_message: You pop a greed pill. Not bad, that was wild. You followed your conscience.

name: greed pill pile
description: Activate or disassemble for two greed pills.

name: clarity pill
description: The clarity pill was outlawed almost as soon as it hit the general public because all of a sudden, everybody had X-ray vision. After consuming the pill, for sixty seconds the eater will be able to see everything. Everything.

use_action.activation_message: You pop a clarity pill. Not bad, that was wild.
